hero.description: Every Sunday, we visit seniors, people with disabilities, and low-income neighbors in New York City who need a little help with their devices, Wi-Fi, or apps.
hero.noCatch: There's no catch. No sales pitch. Just neighbors helping neighbors.
hero.pilotDescription: Our pilot program runs every Sunday in select NYC neighborhoods. We're testing and refining our service model before launching as a full nonprofit.

about.title: About Us
about.description1: Support New York is a community-based volunteer project offering free digital and tech help to seniors, people with disabilities, and low-income neighbors in New York City.
about.description2: We are not a nonprofit (yet) — but we're working toward it. Right now, our services are offered personally, by trained volunteers who care.
about.description3: Our "Community Sundays" program is a pilot project. It helps us test and refine our service model before launching a full nonprofit organization. By working directly with the community, we learn what works, what's needed, and how to better serve.
about.focus1: Helping people connect to Wi-Fi, set up smartphones and apps
about.focus2: Providing light tech support at home
about.focus3: Guiding seniors through common computer tasks (email, video calls, web forms)
about.quote: This isn't a business. This is real help for real neighbors.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Support New York volunteers offer free help with everyday technology challenges. All services are provided on Sundays only.
services.note: All services are free. We focus on low-risk, non-invasive help. We don't handle financial accounts, passwords, or repairs that could cause damage.

smartphone.title: Smartphones & Tablets
smartphone.description: Basic setup, installing apps, accessibility settings

videocall.title: Video Calls
videocall.description: Setting up Zoom, FaceTime, WhatsApp video calls

email.title: Email & Communication
email.description: Creating email accounts, sending attachments, calendar setup

hometech.title: Home Tech Help
hometech.description: Universal remote setup, battery replacement, cord organizing

online.title: Online Tasks
online.description: Filling out web forms, using YouTube, printing documents

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Settings for low vision, hearing aids, mobility needs

stories.title: Stories from the Field
stories.description: Real stories, photos, and feedback from our Sunday service visits. Learn how small tech support can make a big difference.
stories.checkBack: We're collecting stories from our community. Check back soon!
stories.quote: Every Sunday, we open our doors and our hearts. Because technology shouldn't be a barrier — it should be a bridge to connection.
stories.message: Our Community Sundays aren't just about fixing devices. They're about building trust, sharing knowledge, and reminding our neighbors that they're not alone in this digital age.

notice.title: Notice
notice.description: This is where we'll share important updates, volunteer opportunities, and ways you can support our mission.
notice.stayTuned: Stay tuned for news about our nonprofit journey and community events.
notice.serviceAreaMessage: Currently, we are only able to serve Manhattan and Brooklyn near Williamsburg. Service areas may change depending on circumstances. Please contact us by email in advance to confirm availability. Thank you.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Want to ask a question, volunteer, or recommend someone who needs help? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.volunteerDescription: We're always looking for patient, tech-savvy volunteers who want to make a difference in their community. Reach out to learn more about joining our Sunday team.

footer.disclaimer: This is a community volunteer project, not a registered nonprofit (yet).
